name: Eggtraterrestrial Chickens
description:
Eggestraterrestrial Chickens is not your average arcade space shooter since you are a chicken, and your crew of chickens is your health and ammunition. As the captain of your ship, you must fire your chickens to defeat evil hawk ships which drop eggs that provide additional chickens. You must also send your chickens to deliver golden seeds back to the coop for points. All seeds must be returned to the coop by the time limit to progress to the next wave. Hawk ships can either be explosive red ships that try to ram you or purple ships that can shoot projectiles from afar. You will encounter orbiting meteors that you must avoid and slipstreams that provide enhanced mobility. Multitask efficiently delivering seeds while managing your supply of chickens since they also determine how many hits you can take. Aim for a high score and have fun.

Spin and aim your ship with the mouse

Left Click to Shoot Chickens

Right, Click to accelerate.

Esc to pause the game
